p: The relative results of the experiments were presented as the mean Â± SD of the three independent measurements. Analysis of variance and IC 50 calculation were performed with GraphPad Prism 6.0 using one-way ANOVA test and the means were compared by Dunnett tests. P < 0.05 stands for statistically significant difference between extract-treated cells and control. Two-way ANOVA test and bonferroni comparison post-test was used to compare the effect of different extracts in each assay.
